alert.note: Alert for Indian River; Martin; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 30 at 2:46AM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning early this morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees. For the Frost Advisory tonight into Monday morning, temperatures in the low to mid 30s will result in widespread frost formation, mainly inland from Interstate 95. * WHERE...Southern Brevard, Indian River, St. Lucie and Martin Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Indian River; Martin; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie
